price: Berkata dia (Balqis), "Hai para pembesar berilah aku pertimbangan dalam urusanku (ini), aku tidak pernah memutuskan sesuatu persoalan sebelum kamu berada dalam majelis(ku)".
arabic: قَالَتۡ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمَلَؤُاْ أَفۡتُونِي فِيٓ أَمۡرِي مَا كُنتُ قَاطِعَةً أَمۡرًا حَتَّىٰ تَشۡهَدُونِ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālat yāayyuhā al-mala-u aftūnī fī amrī mā kuntu qāṭiʿatan amran ḥattā tashhadūni
